name: Hidden Objects Happy New Year Celebration Pic Time
name_original: Hidden Objects Happy New Year Celebration Pic Time
description:
Hidden Objects – Happy New Year Countdown Celebration is a magnificently designed search and finder game with over 30 Celebration themed levels. Ring in the New Year!

Explore New Years scenes by visiting New York City’s Times Square, the famous Rose Bowl Parade in Pasadena, London’s New Year’s Day Parade, Chinese Dragon Dance, European Cities’ Countdown Celebrations and more!

Find Celebratory & Winter themed objects like Party Hats, Confetti, Clocks, Snowmen, Decorated New Year’s Costumes, frozen Icicles, Santa, Christmas Trees, Snow Globes and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

Brain Challenging Adventure on your New Year’s Resolution List!

Hidden Objects – Happy New Year features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics reflecting New Years Celebrations and frozen Winter themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
